title: Muqam thanks for successful dialogue with JAAC
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 4 (APP): Federal Minister for Kashmir Affairs and Gilgit Baltistan Engineer Amir Muqam has thanked all stakeholders and the Joint Awami Action Committee (JAAC) for playing an effective role for resolving the issue of AJK and the strike was lifted after the agreement was signed.
The Minister acknowledged that “Thanks God that both sides played a positive role”. The desire of the enemy, especially India, to have bloodshed in Kashmir will never be fulfilled, he added.
Today’s successful event have enough proof that every problem can be resolved through unity, tolerance, and dialogue.
